meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You did not learn this reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you to remember: 

<vocabulary>Demon</vocabulary>s are mean. This particular demon bites you on the knee, creating an "O" shape on your knee. He tells you he has cursed you with the <vocabulary>"O" knee</vocabulary> (おに).
